Mr. Fowler to Gov. Magoffin
St. Bt. Dunbar, June 30/61
Gov Magoffin
Frankfort
Dr Sir

Enclosed find ^copy^ letter of instructions to the Capt of My SBt "Dunbar" the regular Mail packet between Paducah & Evansville from the Surveyor of Customs "A L Robinson" at Evansville You will see Kentucky as placed by him on same footing as the Seceded states
I appeal to you as a citizen of your State to protect me in Constitutional privleges due the citizens of Kentucky as long as she remains in the Union
Please investigate & write me at Paducah Ky
